reasoning: Pediatric ALL (age 0-19) incidence ~3.5-4 per 100k children. Expressed per 100k total population (children ~25% globally), approximately 0.9 per 100k. Strong pediatric cancer registry data from SEER and international registries circa 2005.
source: Howlader N et al. SEER Cancer Statistics Review, 1975-2005. National Cancer Institute.
